Blog.post: wah wah wah! story begins..i juz bathe cum out, as i walk to e kitchen..guess wat! i saw a cockroach in e living rm pao lai pao qu..haha *flabbergasted*, i SHOUT 4 my sis n decided to gen zhong it haha n i realise it is v e BIG. gt 2 50cents coin size lol yeah n she there saying she learn frm tv, a cockroack zhuan jia say b4 cockroaches will only roam abt after 12midnite, if b4 tt thy were seen crawlin ard, it shows tt they hm is OVERCROWDED. lol win liao sia, gt time muz go check it out where is their nest, den can yi wang da jing! haha. heex enuff of e cockroack qi yu le..mm oh ya so pai seh today, junaidah lesson she teach halfway den suddenly say "peishan is trying v hard to stay awake." den she was giggling. haha muz b i keep yawning sia..zzzZzZz tml gt SYF again. sianx.will reach sch by 730 earliest means i reach hm shld b 9 le ba. lol hope tml can spot sum shuai ges on e parade. haha n hopefully e sun nt so sai..=S yeah~!!! listen to jolin burn de album today haha dao dai v nice! haha luv luv luv & ling meng chao de wei dao also hen hao ting! (='o'=) ok la..my hai you ming tian start liao..cya. =]

wat to say..1st day of sch suxxs.. ms junaidah make us write 5 essays cos we din do 1..n e WE includes 10plus of us? gd luck everybody..tonite can 4get abt slping..n newsletter yet to b completed means 6 essays awaits me.. chi lesson wang jian ping let us listen to a song by AH SANG title YE ZI haha den she down there fen xi e lyrics n how sad e person feels after he/she shi lian..mm tot she so gd let us listen songs..so e nightmare came at e end of period..she wan us to write sth on e title SHI QU NI YI HOU..duh bt nt so bad cos e ni can b sth..mm which means i can write how i feel after i lose at pen..haha.. n e worse of e day..my netb pals came to tell me tt our batch cca pts is only 5 or 6..sian a B at most..duh sec 1 tt time shld clever a bit join choir..ha stand there bai mei also gt performances n get many pts..lol.. ye zi shi bu hui fei xiang de chi pang chi pang shi luo zai tian shang de ye zi tian tang yuan lai ying gai bu shi wang xiang zhi shi wo zao yi yi wang dang chu zhem me kai shi fei xiang nice lyrics..ye zi =]

stupid...! hahax england actually lost 2day match..extension 30 mins n penalty..played till ard 545am.. *yawn wonderin, predicting, guessing wat could b on e newpaper frnt pg today. owen finally gt 1 shot in & in juz 3 mins after 1st half start? eng lodt cos rooney was injured n couldnt play? beckham da zui ren cos his penalty kick was out of e box? sian..tink beck sure hit tou tiao de..his country ppl sure reprimand him sia so jing zhang n stressful was e match. tie in 90mins.tie agin in 30mins ET. c le also can heart attack haha e penalty ar if beck aim zhun a bit n gt in jiu hao.toot de. hey bt had to say por gk also v li hai lol find tis match worth watchin afterall. hl sk n pearl den funny keep flood me wif sms. haha mm tink mostly is scold beck de ba..sumhow he looked quite conifdent b4 kicking tt ball? haha n suppose he shld haf gt tt shot in..mm he capatin leh lol he so ke lian =S juz how e eng players n supporters feel after their match..mm sad, disappointed,grumblin,screaming,crying? kind of hope tt thy could win sia yet thy lost so unexpectedly haha it's true tt ppl learn frm mistakes. one or two? failed attempts doesnt meant tt one will b a loser 4eva.mm so beckham next penalty betta get in! haha

haha c ppl blog like almost everyday also gt entry..den mine..4 days once? lolx..cant blame lazy on tis com tt always hang..=[ mm last fri saw e chnl U show at 830pm..is abt fried kway teow n only $2..cant rmb e show title bt i count count count den realise tt show shld b e show tt will cast sum scenes of jl being interviewd inside..lol so tis fri muz rmb tune in..haha sat n sun slackin day..wahaha wonder which sec4 can b as slack as me..lol sun mornin woke uo at 7plus den realise sat nite sk sms go play bad is meet at 7..so i m late n she reached warren liao..so 4get it sia..go my hse park there 4 a jog instead..lol so today climb lotsa times e stairs..lol tink in total gt climb 17 storeys today sia..duh..today e time seemed to pass v quickly..sk n hl were sayin tt n i sumhow agree to a certain extent..haha cos almost haf e day i was slping..den maths period funniest..tink e relative vel chap i can die le..dun understand den dun bother find out..hl comical sia..halfway thru e lesson she called "ps" den i "huh?" back (cos i also falling aslp) den she said "pinch me leh..i wan fall aslp le" lolX i ALREADY ASLP le..zi shen nan bao ar~~~ oh ya..yq was sick today..hey ger..take care of yur health k..=] wan watch yur performance on sat de wor..GET WELL SOON~! oh..F.I.R cuming to spore next sun..haha 4pm at hard rock cafe n 7pm at westmall lolx..e main singer quite chio n her voice v powerful also..tink their album worth buying.. listened to GU DAN BEI BAN QIU by lin yi chen..lol a taiwan actress..sounds weird compared to ocean wan..differ frm e original piece by ocean haha..tink is cos her lyrics all e NI bcum WO n e WO bcum NI..mm guai4 guai4 de bt still hao ting la =D

finally tis lan keyboard of mine works after i shut down n on again n again..so faster add an entry tink quite long since i written 1..haha.. yday day was a great BLUNDER..was late for abt 5 mins for e test..den mrs sim was like "dun yur know being late will gif a bad impression to e examiner" den we were like stunned dere..lol bt later when my turn den i gt apologise la..den she say nvm jux dun wan us repeat same mistake again..whew =S MUSIC~! stupid..i duno anyth much leh den i saw e pic i wan like DIE! really can go bang wall le..music music........well e pic ar dun even know wat is e instrument on e floor..den i rmb one of e instrument looked familiar..when i was young like gt c b4..den realise is those kinda i saw it b4 on those pic card for childen learn alphabets de.. haha gt A for apple 4, B for boy wan..den e instrument is X for XYLOPHONE! haha bt e pic card gt colour la den tis wan black n white,so i also dun dare cfm bt den i juz huo4 chu1 qu4 dun care le lolx den really tyco milo..anyhow lai also can correct when later my fren cfm wif me tt is a xylophone..sekali say wrong instrument den cham..lolX heng~ =B den convo part ar tink my crappy skill nt bad la..only mayb sum words nt suitable wan i also anyhow throw in..haha den keep pausin also..duh..ask me attend any musical event den i bo bian say cultural pot..lol also duno how i manage to say sth abt tt event out of my mouth..=S yeah..so today is quite slack..maths test den when end is like 3 periods almost gone..haha den sum of e dance ppl went to b helpers..kat v funny say 6677 shao3 le3 hl a bit weird n quiet..lolX so HL! IF U READING TIS U SHLD KNOW HOW IMPT U R WOR~! haha bt den..i was sayin "hui meh? ok la haha only no ppl do chem experiment wif me n let me copy end results" hahahA lol later gt meteor garden II last episodes le..muz watch sia shld b v gan ren..haha oh ya as usual muz intro songs to all..CYNDI - YU MAO~!!! wahaha track 10 of her ai ni album lolx..anyway i haf cyndi ai ni n jolin chen bao cd (burn de) extra..lol interested can tell me..lol =]

haha tis mth really a lot ppl bday..duh yeah bt my family din celebrate my dad bday at all..mm partly is my dad dun wan ba..we youngsters celebrate cos we grew mature evry yr..bt for my dad thy feel thy grew OLDER every yr..lol.. mm slack n do only e mgs emaths paper in e noon..den evenin went jogging wif my sis..haha we jog ard e same area n estate..my sis kept saying "ma lu la" lol yeah bt she would kept lookin ard for cute guys? lol cos she said she met 2 last wk..tink 1 live same block as us den on 12th floor..so she would ALWAYS look out of e window..at 12th floor..hopin to c tis guy tt she yi jian zhong qing~! hahaHA tink she will kill me if she reads tis..lol so back to joggin..mm mostly i joggin she chasin ba..duh my stamina is lan already sia..tink we both need to train up more le..haha.. hey zhang feng qi cd is nice..haha cant blief he was once a monk..lucky he nw nt le or a bit wasted sia..lol he 17 only..e XIANG HAO TING!! TRACK 9! rmb go listen! haha mm bt e jap words i also duno wat meanin la =D

wahh has been rainin for e past few days..everyday also ling yu go sch..duh..sian sian sian sian sian..=S today pe we played rugby, haha actually we played till more like netb instead..den jq v farnie..lolx she actually wan use e rugby play to tap mr chng in order to freeze him..tt time he was trapped in a corner den he tot he was bound to get tapped cos jq was so near him.den she stretched her arms out wif e rugby in her hands to tap mr chng bt SHE MISSED~~!haha so comical..she stretched her utmost bt missed him by a few inches..den e rest of us, e guys n mr chng was luffing like siao there n we luff till cry sia..alamak muz really c her action den will luff de lolX. chem pract a bit zuo bo..cos all e gas i(& hl lol) test, like gt NO effect on litmus or splinter de.den i v lazy test wif limewater lol sian.. so end up..took my fren's copy n can1 kao3..........haha..=D eng ar go thru oral stuff..gt a feeling i next wk sure fail 4 e reading aloud, pic n convo part, i.e. fail all sections~ haha..die le la........................... after sch went ginza wif hl, we went to eat mac haha specially go eat mac for e doggie haha hl gt 2 le i only gt 1..lol nw muz psyco my sis go eat den can buy =P e dog is really v e cute! haha den after tt we walk ard a while n i went to photocopy phy ws tt i tot i lost..duh to my astonishment..I FOUND E WS WHILE I WAS SEARCHING FOR MY SS NOTES! ayy!!!!!!!!!! stupid de waste my time tot missin den so scared pandian will hump dump me..so tis is a lesson to b learnt..phy ws sumtimes can also get mixed wif other subjs ws de! =S haha tings r changing every moment juz like e earth is spinning every second.. time cant b rewind.. sum tings cant b undo no matter how much u wish for.. yeah..look on e bright side =] CheEr Up gER~! NeVeR LuV a lUv tHaT hUrtS, nEveR hAtE a LUv ThAt luVS ( 'o',)

wah betta write sth 1st since i CAN type nw, meanin my keyboard workin well..haha so long den add an entry sia. muz write a bit wat happened past few days.last sat syf i lost my way! duh..i die die also wun forget how to walk frm e national stadium to kallang mrt! stupid..=[ den had dinner at taka wif hl jq kat yq cl hh dh mx n WEI HUN HU~ etc. yeah it was after i had found my way out of e national stadium. or in more accurately, my frens found me..=S ermm den mon youth day holi went temple pray, hopefully wat i wish for cum trie sia.=] den went tb wif my cousins lor..nth much yet one day passed so fast. duh yday had netb training..find tt i really LAO le..alamak PT den i slacking there liao.. bt heng my coach no c me..haha *whew* den later had match wif e tchers like mr chee, mr chin, mr chia, mr ng etc n MR FOO! unbelievable~ he last time bball player sia den he play shooter..wahaha so funny bt tink his aiming quite zhun also la. i played for half time of e 2nd half game..wah den mr foo later sub ppl in, lol his old injury ba e knee there injured..so u c he today limped ard in sch. lol today went to watch windstruck wif jq..yeah both of us only haha cos rest nt free. duh so e show is quite touchin, e nu zhu jiao is v e chio~! lol many ppl cried sia. den gt 3 gers cum out of e cinema in frnt of us their eyes all red, den gt sum1 ask me n jq wat show we watch, we told them den thy were like "wahh, tt show so gan ren ar, e 3 gers cry till so li hai" lol actually ok lah, me only gt tears in my eyes durin sum scenes haha.. hey den i saw qian ji bian havin part 2 le lol gt EDISON~! 12 aug! which is one day after my sis bday..haha can treat her to watch..lalala.. yeah nth much le..lol oh yar pandian say i clown today! lol e stupid physics magnetic field tingy..haha

wahaha! HL zhu ni shen rie kuai le! haha! tink i clever le, know she 12am sure a lot ppl flood her so i gonna b special a bit..so i i intend to sms tonite at 11:59 haha lidat betta leh..e last ying xiang more shen ke! lolx n most imptly! tink no1 will wan fight wif me for e last also hahaha! wah..had been rainin 4 e past 2 days morning as well as today..ling yu go sch sia..bt gd ting is my time is past 7:30 den rain no pink form..whew* haha n it means no flag raisin also! yippeee mdm poon pms today! scold me tt e notice board e class motto kept dropping down n i din do anyth ..pls loh e wind in our class so strong.put up le next moment drops down also gt my fault..n say wat e blue cloth v ugly..stupid also no1 ask her c..is our class ppl buy fr class fund de also nt use her money..crapz..lucky she last 2 periods nt in class..n me n hl were happily chattin n luffing most of e time haha tink yq looked at us n gif those "2 crazy ppl bside her" face, haha ppl all doin work n we copying, cos later den we know muz hand in lolx today 1st n 2nd period no lesson, tchers all go 4 emergency meetin ba..tink gt ppl outside complain abt our sch those hu go syf misbehave during e rehearsals..yeah juz e few of them draggin e whole lot of us, our sch down. damn..tink mr foo v angry..still ask those involve in syf gather in e hall n gave us LECTURES hahaz..say tings like behaving ourselves, nt spoil sch image..yeah.. rules r stricter sia..n i was EXTREMELY lucky to b caught by banana..my hair la..was force to tie it up in frnt of her..dot..n sk was caught for her hair colour..ppl b careful tink gonna haf spot check on tues le...n we missed 2 periods of maths lesson..nt bad. hey greece won! stupid. thy so rough loh n can c czech skills n attacking is much betta, juz lacking sum luck ba..sianz all i hope win wan no win..toot..mm nw clever le..for e finals hope greece win! haha know wat i mean? =D anyway cx comical yday sia..call me near midnite wan tell me thy were at e hawker n jl was interviewed by chnl u..haha is abt cheap n delicious supper where to get de ba n thy ask him..haha shall tune in to chnl u on 23rd lolX c he ben ren or on tv looks betta haha =j yeah tml is e real syf performance..wo deng zhe tian deng hen jiu le! haha hope e performance is gonna b a success, n hope i din make any mistake lolx =]

wah yday after syf rehears too tired le. 11plus jiu slp liao, tink is e earliest ever since sch reopen haha for e 1st time no shi mian.. so today all e while in sch we were passin paper ard deciding where to go, mos la bk la yoshi la mac la..den pass till hl she all write thomson plaza, true sia there really gt everyting we mention..=S haha mm so FINALLY we made up our mind n we went to jp mos to celebrate hl bday,although her bday is tml. bt cos she tml gt dance so we celebrated in advance. lol n today is jial bd!haha happy bday to her! =] haha today ncc day! lol on our bus trip to jp, wearin his ncc U, jeff sat alone on e bus at 1st. den later there was an ncc guy frm hkss in ncc U also went to sit bside him..mm den i was wonderin tt guy wat rank cos like no stripe de only gt one pic look like diamond shape..haha so i sms jeff ask him..den he send back "lance coporal..so small..sec2" haha den i replied ask him put down his sleeve show e guy his rank wahaha jeff 1st sergeant wor! lolx e guy also will xia dao sia. hah bt den he replied say e guy saw his rank liao b4 he sat down..no fun =S haha so wat we did at e mos, we eat lor! haha n chat lah..tc a lot..e guys were talking abt e portugal n holland match..orbee ronaldo yellow card =D haha he so act cool. lol figo gt man of e match! sth to cheer abt!haha yeah n we were discussin wat to buy 4 our classmates bday tml..mm same say as hl..n one next wk. so after eatin we went to buy e presents..lol took quite sum time decidin. n we bought one sweet ar in tube de, den e tip is gt a bball n a net covered by plastic den hor gt 1 button let u press, c if u can get e ball into e net. i manage get a few in! err my description a bit lan sia bt agar agar shld b can pic? lol yeah we bought tt for hh bday on sat n yq bought 1 for hx (hh's younger bro, yq tinks tt he is super cute) haha den later went popular buy blank cds gif hl ask her help me burn cd..mm after tt hl met jial amanda n kelly n e rest of us all headed hm. e bus trip fell aslp..super lethargic~!haha ermm jolin cd weird sia. e dao dai song backgrd like gt a man's voice singing as well..alamak lunar qi yue nt here yet sia unless eng wan den v zhun today..=( haha ok lah watchin halfway e child hope. hopefully later i can endure till 245 watch czech n greece match bt i tink is impossible. cant resist temptation of my bad n air con haha so to all those hu r watchin later, enjoy ya match~! =)

I FINALLY CAN TYPE LE~~~~~~~~!!!after tryin for e whole afternoon today for ever since my previous entry...=D HAO KAI XIN~! lalala~~!!!! HAPPY NATIONAL DAY~~!!!! LALA~~!!haha last sat went esplanade c e fireworks..wah so MANY PPL..nw i understand wat "ppl mountain ppl sea" means in chi..lol squeeze until cant..stand put also gt ppl push u move forward lol i went wif sk cos we go later nv go eat dinner wif them..summore traffic jam at orchard..duh den reach le wanna find hl thy all also diff..den ask them thy at where boon say gt a place gt no trees wan..den there gt v gd view nth block them..alamak..den we keep find keep wan contact them bt no reception at all..stupid..so end up we cant find..me n sk down there saying"boon stupid idea ask us go there c wat fireworks" wahh.. den nag zhe nag zhe e fireworks start le..ppl ard me keep "wah wah wah" den i c liao also stunned..V CHIO SIA!!!!!!!!!! suddenly gt one xing fu de gan jue hahaha..so i apologise for sayin boon wor..mm thnx for ya idea haha mm.. bt still dun like e squeezing part lolx. =P yeah den afte e fireworks all ppl spread out liao..me n sk still down there walk lai walk qu..4 abt 1 hr searching for them..bt to no avail..so we decided retreat back to suntec mayb there gt reception den can call them..n when we reached there we did managed to contact boon den thy say thy at city link tt 7-11.. duh tt was abt 10 le ba..finally we gt to meet up wif them..haha den we all there bao yuan say keep callin cant reach one another super gek..haha bt end up gt meet up jiu hao..*whew* wasted quite a long time there..den we walked together to e concert stage..hehe say duan chen feng..haha den K1 n one grp call tai ji..haha weird..den managed catch a bit 5566 b4 tt..haha nt bad e performance v nice..bt we din stay long lah..watch a while den walked back to e suntec there n sat down on e stairs..we took photos lor..stupid shaun take pic no action no expression wan..haha den me n sk ask him hyper a bit den he mian qiang smile..lol duh~ yeah den after everyting met up wif my sis..phone no reception den she n her fre waited for me for 1 hr..cant blame i also kept call her cant reach..bt still managed meet her at cck..den we song her fren hm at bpp there den we 2 walked hm..later got to realise samuel (kong) was there (at e espaanade) also..still playin pool when i reached hm at 1plus..rich jiu shi rich haha n i saw lp n alan gang there also..oh ya n jingyi wif her bf..bt hor i keep look at her den she like gif me tt kind"i m alien" look i tot i c wrong..duh..den after tt i sms her den realise it really was her.. she din recognise me i tink..lol =S yday national day!~! went picnic at marina south wif my aunties uncles cousin thy all..got my sis also la..den quite fun cos v long no cum out wif them le..thy wan c e fireworks..mm so we waited lor..we reached abt 4plus haha den a lot ppl flyin kites den police keep cum say cant fly..cos national day den later e helicopter will fly past den string might gt entangled or wat.. haha den played wif my little cousins n i i realise thy v cute~~!!!!!!!!haha my phone gt their pics..haha mm den when e fireworks start every1 was wah wah wah again..lol bt tink e fireworks v little compared to sat de..n it's so far away..sat de is juz above me like wan drop down on me lidat..haha bt yday wan gt heart shape wan..most amazing.. sat dun haf.. so both days also nice la..>. oh ya..sorry kor~ nv go wif u 4 e ndp.. next time i sure go k..if u ask me la..lol end up u went wif yur dad bt i blief it was still fun rite.. glad u enjoy e parade esp e fireworks haha =)
